_header: For cause all men shall understand
_description: James Ryman, moral advice, for the most part a paraphrase of Proverbs viii — eighteen quatrains and one stanza rhyme royal

CULEe112.First Lines:
ffor cause alle men shall vnderstondeMy lordes preceptes Iuste and
                    Right…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…The whiche mote graunt bothe you & meThat blisse wherof
                    none ende shall be
CULEe112.Attributed Title:
Accipite disciplinam meam et non pecuniam Doctrinam magis quam aurum
                        eligite parabolarum 8o (f. 73v)

Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.
